options.name: -b
tip: issue warnings about str(bytes_instance), str(bytearray_instance)and comparing bytes/bytearray with str.
(-bb: issue errors)

options.name: -B
tip: don't write .pyc files on import;
also PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=x

options.name: -c
options.tip: cmd. program passed in as string (terminates option list)

options.name: -d
tip: turn on parser debugging output (for experts only, only works on debug builds);
also PYTHONDEBUG=x

options.name: -E
options.tip: ignore PYTHON* environment variables (such as PYTHONPATH)

options.name: -i
-I
options.tip: isolate Python from the user's environment (implies -E and -s)

options.name: -m
options.tip: mod. run library module as a script (terminates option list)

options.name: -O
tip: remove assert and __debug__-dependent statements;
add .opt-1 before .pyc extension; also PYTHONOPTIMIZE=x

options.name: -OO
tip: do -O changes and also discard docstrings;
add .opt-2 before .pyc extension

options.name: -p
options.tip: don't prepend a potentially unsafe path to sys.path

options.name: -q
options.tip: don't print version and copyright messages on interactive startup

options.name: -s
options.tip: don't add user site directory to sys.path; also PYTHONNOUSERSITE

options.name: -u
tip: force the stdout and stderr streams to be unbuffered
this option has no effect on stdin; also PYTHONUNBUFFERED=x

options.name: -v
tip: verbose (trace import statements)
also PYTHONVERBOSE=x can be supplied multiple times to increase verbosity

options.name: -W
-x
options.tip: skip first line of source, allowing use of non-Unix forms of #!cmd

options.name: -X
tip: opt
set implementation-specific option

options.name: --check-hash-based-pycs
options.tip: control how Python invalidates hash-based .pyc files

options.name: -V
tip: print the Python version number and exit
when given twice, print more information about the build

options.name: --help-env
options.tip: print help about Python environment variables and exit

options.name: --help-xoptions
options.tip: print help about implementation-specific -X options and exit

options.name: --help-all
options.tip: print complete help information and exit

common_options.name: --h
tip: U: -h|-?|--help
print this help message and exit
